channel.title: research on TheDataAreClean
channel.description: Recent content in research on TheDataAreClean

item.title: Lost In Consumption
item.description: __ A few months ago, I started this personal research project better understand the challenges of education sector in India from two lenses of Child Rights and FOSS. I was extremely excited about the idea, and wanted to try a bunch of things. Once I started researching I realised that how a small idea in my head just turned into this vast universe. Now matter how I tried to address it, I was getting lost in more and more questions.
